description: Farming dashboard for use with chia-exporter

panels.description: Number of blocks in the blockchain
panels.title: Height

panels.description:
Height: Number of blocks in the blockchain

Blocks per 18.75 seconds:
Based on 86400 seconds in a day and a target of 4608 blocks in a day, we expect a block every 18.75 seconds. The rate of blocks is calculated based on a rolling one hour window.

If this number is less than 1, the chain is moving slower than the target, and you would expect difficulty to decrease at the next adjustment.

If the number is greater than 1,  the chain is moving faster than the target and you would expect difficulty to increase at the next adjustment.
panels.title: Height

targets.expr: quantile_over_time(1.0,{job="chia_harvest"} |= `proofs` | pattern `<timestamp> <_> <_> <_> <plots> plots <_> Found <proofs> proofs. Time: <time> <_>` | proofs > 0 |  unwrap time [$__interval]) by (host)

{job="chia_harvest"} |= `proofs` | pattern `<timestamp> <_> <_> <_> <plots> plots <_> Found <proofs> proofs. Time: <time> <_>` | proofs > 0 | line_format `{{.timestamp}} {{.host}} Found {{.proofs}} proof. Time: {{.time}}s. {{.plots}} eligible plots.`
{job="chia_harvest"} |= `qualities` | pattern `<timestamp> <_> <_> <_> <_> <_> <_> <_> <_> <_> <_> <time>. <_>` | line_format `{{.timestamp}} {{.host}} Looking up quality took {{.time}}s.`

title: Chia Farming
